summary: Sach discovers that he is heir to a farm in rural hillbilly country. He and the boys go to the farm to check it out, and find themselves mixed up with feuding hillbillies and a gang of bank robbers.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Dorothy Ford|Lyle Talbot|Benny Baker|Anne Kimbell|Oliver Blake|Bernard Gorcey|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Fuzzy Knight|Robert Easton|O.Z. Whitehead|Paul Wexler|Russell Simpson|Leo 'Ukie' Sherin|Arthur Space|Robert Bray|Robert Keys|Stanley Blystone|Elizabeth Russell
keywords: bowery manhattan new york city|private detective|mistaken identity|kentucky|investigation
title: Feudin' Fools
